data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
"I like to maintain a comely exterior so people can like me more." ( Word, Comely as an Adj. )

"His death sentence was adjourned to late June 2023" (Word, Adjourned as a Verb )

"I don't want to help with the cumbersome luggage that we have to bring into our house this evening." ( Word, Cumbersome as an Adj. )

"I don't understand how someone can be so opinionated yet so understanding" ( word, Opinionated, as an Adj. )

"I hate watching atrocities made by broad-minded individuals regarding certain subjects." ( Word, Atrocities as a noun )

"I like to modify my behavior depending on the person I'm speaking to. It's just more convenient for me." ( Word, Modify as a verb )

"Logistically, I don't see why a person so horrible could be the most beloved celebrity right now." ( Word, Logistically)

I'm trying to build my vocabulary up and my verbal fluency because it's bad. I usually hesitate when adding new words because I'm terrified if I'm using them incorrectly. Please help! Thank you so much. :)
